enumDescriptions.Enabled: This function or resource has been enabled
enumDescriptions.Disabled: This function or resource has been disabled
enumDescriptions.Offline: This function or resource is enabled, but currently unavailable
enumDescriptions.InTest: This function or resource is underdoing testing
enumDescriptions.Starting: This function or resource is starting
enumDescriptions.Absent: This function or resource is not installed

State.description: The known state of the resource, such as if it is enabled.
State.specification: This property shall represent if this component is available or not and why.  Enabled indicates the resource is available.  Disabled indicates the resource has been intentionally made unavailable but it can be enabled.  Offline indicates the resource is unavailable intentionally and requires action to be made available.  InTest indicates that the component is undergoing testing.  Starting indicates that the resource is on its way to becoming available.  Absent indicates the resources is physically unavailable.

enumDescriptions.Warning: A condition exists that requires attention
enumDescriptions.Critical: A critical condition exists that requires immediate attention

HealthRollUp.description: The overall health state from the view of this resource.
HealthRollUp.specification: This property shall represent the HealthState of the resource and its dependent resources.  The values shall conform to those defined in the Redfish specification.

enumDescriptions.Warning: A condition exists that requires attention
enumDescriptions.Critical: A critical condition exists that requires immediate attention

Health.description: The health state of this resource in the absence of its dependent resources.
Health.specification: This property shall represent the HealthState of the resource without considering its dependent resources. The values shall conform to those defined in the Redfish specification.

description: The standard status structure for resources.
